title: Tiki armor
summaries: Tiki armor is a Hardmode post-Plantera armor set purchased from the Witch Doctor for 150 in total. On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, the Pygmy Staff must be in the player's inventory in order for the Witch Doctor to sell the armor.
A full set of Tiki armor provides the following benefits:

With all pieces equipped, an additional 4 minions can be summoned (for a total of 5). With the right buffs and accessories, a total of 10 minions can be summoned (see tips section below). Additionally, wearing the complete set boosts summon damage by 30%.

statistics.Set Bonus: Increases your max number of minions
statistics.Buy: 150 (set)
statistics.Sell: 30 (set)
